document_data.name: Clan Belnak
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Belnak''' was one of the [[dragonborn]] [[Thymari#Clans|clans]] of the nation of [[Tymanther]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Hand of Darkness|6}}
document_data.History: Clan Belnak was a traditional ally of [[Clan Jalt]]. As such, Clan Belnak had representatives in the frontier village of [[Ruinspoke]].
document_data.Known members: *[[Belnak Vikom]], the representative of Clan Belnak in Ruinspoke, as of [[1480 DR]].
